verses.verse: O clap<WH8628> your hands<WH3709>, all you people<WH5971>; shout<WH7321> unto God<WH430> with the voice<WH6963> of triumph<WH7440>.
For the Lord<WH3068> most high<WH5945> is terrible<WH3372>; he is a great<WH1419> King<WH4428> over all the earth<WH776>.
He shall subdue<WH1696> the people<WH5971> under us<WH3816>, and the nations under our feet<WH7272>.
He shall choose<WH977> our inheritance<WH5159> for us<WH1347>, the excellency of Jacob<WH3290> whom he loved<WH157>. Selah<WH5542>.
God<WH430> is gone up<WH5927> with a shout<WH8643>, the Lord<WH3068> with the sound<WH6963> of a trumpet<WH7782>.
Sing praises<WH2167> to God<WH430>, sing praises<WH2167>: sing praises<WH2167> unto our King<WH4428>, sing praises<WH2167>.
For God<WH430> is the King<WH4428> of all the earth<WH776>: sing you praises<WH2167> with understanding<WH7919>.
God<WH430> reigns<WH4427> over the heathen<WH1471>: God<WH430> sits<WH3427> upon the throne<WH3678> of his holiness<WH6944>.

The princes<WH5081> of the people<WH5971> are gathered together<WH622>, even the people<WH5971> of the God<WH430> of Abraham<WH85>: for the shields<WH4043> of the earth<WH776> belong unto God<WH430>: he is greatly<WH3966> exalted<WH5927>.
